title: Bloomberg Markets: Dunn Discusses Protecting Endowments
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dunn Discusses Protecting Endowments
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010James Dunn\u0010CEO\u0010Verger Capital Management \u0010Discussing the endowment outlook and the challenges he faces in the current market environment. Janet Lorin, Bloomberg News Higher Education Reporter, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
